titles.title: A concurrent resolution commending the citizens of the city of Jerusalem on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the reunification of the city.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 6/4/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress, on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the reunification of the city of Jerusalem, commending the citizens of Jerusalem for working together to maintain unobstructed access to the holy sites in the city.
